HomeHero.title: Find the Transplanter You Need.
HomeHero.subtitle: Discover the power and precision of our competitively priced spades designed to revolutionize your excavation and tree transplantation projects.

HomeTopProducts.title: Top Products
HomeTopProducts.cardDescription: This spade will allow you to transplant trees with a diameter at breast height of Ø{diameterBreastHeight} with ease and efficiency.

Card-1.cardDescription: Municipalities are increasingly demanding transplantation for their urban projects, become their new reference landscaper?

Card-2.cardDescription: Offer builders/developers the possibility to plant their trees anew on their new construction projects.

Card-3.cardDescription: Optimize landscaping by integrating mature trees. Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Nemo quae odit perspiciatis deserunt, dignissimos reprehenderit labore libero perferendis sit nobis.

HomeSustainability.title: Why Transplant?
HomeSustainability.div-1: Don’t wait decades for the tree to grow. Gain up to 30 years and transplant adult trees on your projects
HomeSustainability.div-2: Beautify your projects! Offer your clients mature trees that will provide flowers and fruit in the second year after transplantation
HomeSustainability.div-3: If you love them, don’t cut them down, transplant them. We need them now more than ever

HomeGO.title: A Growing Demand
HomeGO.div-1: , that’s the annual growth in quote requests announced by ASC, a transplantation specialist since 2020.
HomeGO.div-2: More and more municipalities and developers are urgently seeking companies equipped with transplanters.
HomeGO.div-3: Take advantage of a market with little competition and become the reference in your region! We are the first to offer transplanters at affordable prices. Be the first to equip yourself
